name: Little Iblis
description:
Guide Little Iblis across his once friendly homeland, by dashing and bouncing on walls and enemies to find a path. 

There are 8 short levels. Try not to take damage for a better score. The save only works if you download the game, on browser the score and unlocked levels will reset.

Controls :

-arrow keys to move

-z or spacebar to dash

-backspace to go back to the main menu
